title: Figuring out Church in Back Row British Columbia
description:
Daniel wanted to share his story. He grew up in church watching good people but trying to figure out what they're doing. He's got wonderful parents who always have his back. 

Notes
Normal speed
Parents grew up Mennonite, went to an EV Free church
Lots of good people but I could never figure out what they were doing
Homeschooled
Pentecostal Christian high School
Tiling 
Started isolating himself
Got into drugs, destroyed his whole world
Worked as a cook at a Christian summer camp
Culture war stuff
2 years of Jordan Peterson youtubes until he was mapped
What he wanted Sunday School to be as a kid 
Explaining religious ideas and language
Jonathan Pageau
Back row, front row
Class resentment
Punk rock music
More lost, more with the misfits of culture
Resentment against girls
Resentment in the culture war
Project to figure out what this is that my culture is based on that I can’t understand
Watching the breakdown of basic civility between people
This is because we’re not Christian anymore. Nobody wants to have grace for people anymore
What’s going on with this religious problem. 
Fun to watch people make connections, teaches you how to make it yourself
Bad relationship
Drinking like crazy
Dignity by Chris Arnade https://amzn.to/2NVihh8
